# resume Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    resume = {
      source = "deutz.io/provider/resume"
    }
  }
}

provider "resume" {}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) Resume API Endpoint
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Resume API Token
